Till today this society has done different kinds of work and services to maximum of people to whom who are the direct beneficiaries of society. Activities and Achievements are mentioned in following paras: 01. Free insurance to Economical weaker section- By the help of Life Insurance of India this society has done hundreds of policies to the weaker section of society. This act gives the future prospects and confidence for people. 02. Medical/Health checkup- Twice a year Medical and Health awareness camps are being regularly organized by the society. This gives a sound health and several precautions to the masses in their daily routine. 03. Job Orientation Camps- Society has organized quarterly Job Oriented Camps for people of below poverty line in different area of district. This has given so many opportunities for people to earn their livelihood. 04. Free Distribution of needful goods. Society has organized so many camps where in medicines, clothes, books to children and other important seasonal goods are regularly distributed amongst poor and needy people by the society.
